Text:
I forgot to include the tilt commands to the Xpadder pro file, so if you're using Xpadder, you might want to change the profile to this:

http://bayimg.com/HAmDdaaEL

PS. Don't be put off by the fact that this is an emulation, it's very easy to use & it plays just like a PC game with very nice graphics, I'm playing this using the Full screen on at 1920x1080 res, game plays perfectly. I couldn't get the PC version to play properly, just got a white screen, but there's no problems with this version, enjoy.

I forgot to enable the plugin for saves, simple fix:

http://bayimg.com/OamDcaAEL
